name: Yamaha XSR 155
discription: The bike uses a 155.1 cc engine, which is a single cylinder, liquid cooled, FI (fuel injection) engine with a maximum power of 19.3 HP @ 10,000 rpm, a maximum torque of 14.7 Nm @ 8500 rpm. This bike has 6 speed manual gear and its maximum speed is 145 kilometers per hour.

name: Yamaha R15 V4
discription: Yamaha uses a 155cc engine in their bike, which is a liquid-cooled, 4-stroke, SOHC, 4-valve. It is capable of generating a maximum power of 13.5kW (18.4PS) / 10000 RPM and a maximum torque of 14.2 Nm (1.4 kgfm) @ 7,500 RPM. The fuel capacity of the bike is 11 liters

name: Yamaha R15 v3 Indian
discription: The bike Yamaha R15 v3, available in Bangladesh market both of Indian and Indonesian version. The bike is a 155.1cc engine, which is single cylinder. Its maximum power is 19.3 HP @ 10,000 rpm and maximum torque 15 nm @ 8500 rpm. It has a 6-speed manual gear.

name: Yamaha R15 v3 Monster
discription: The bike Yamaha R15 v3, available in Bangladesh market both of Indian and Indonesian version. The bike is a 155.1cc engine, which is single cylinder. Its maximum power is 19.3 HP @ 10,000 rpm and maximum torque 15 nm @ 8500 rpm.

name: Yamaha R15 v3 Indonesian
discription: The bike Yamaha R15 v3, available in Bangladesh market both of Indian and Indonesian version. The bike is a 155.1cc engine, which is single cylinder. Its maximum power is 19.3 HP @ 10,000 rpm and maximum torque 15 nm @ 8500 rpm.

name: Yamaha XSR 155 ABS
discription: Yamaha uses a 155cc engine in their bike, which is a liquid-cooled, 4-stroke, SOHC, 4-valve. It is capable of generating a maximum power of 13.5kW (18.4PS) / 10000 RPM and a maximum torque of 14.2 Nm (1.4 kgfm) @ 7,500 RPM.
